Monster ID10397

The Spiked Turoth is a superior variant of the turoth. It has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Weapons and armour
    • 1.3 Runes
    • 1.4 Herbs
    • 1.5 Seeds
    • 1.6 Materials
    • 1.7 Coins
    • 1.8 Gem drop table
    • 1.9 Tertiary
    • 1.10 Superior Slayer tertiary

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 340,641 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Spiked Turoth kill is worth 58,862.55.

The average Spiked Turoth kill while on a Konar task is worth 60,921.63.
